è¶™è±¹å‡ºï¼Œç‹å¬å¹³åŸå›èˆ‡è¶™ç¦¹è€Œå‘Šä¹‹ã€‚ å°æ›°ï¼šã€Œç™¼ç™¾è¬ä¹‹è»è€Œæ”»ï¼Œè¸°æ­²æœªå¾—ä¸€åŸï¼Œä»Šåå—åŸå¸‚é‚‘åä¸ƒï¼Œæ­¤å¤§åˆ©ï¼Œä¸å¯å¤±ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ ç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œå–„ã€‚ã€ ä¹ƒä»¤è¶™å‹å—åœ°ï¼Œå‘Šé¦®äº­æ›°ï¼šã€Œæ•åœ‹ä½¿è€…è‡£å‹ï¼Œæ•åœ‹å›ä½¿å‹è‡´å‘½ï¼Œä»¥è¬æˆ¶éƒ½ä¸‰å°å¤ªå®ˆï¼Œåƒæˆ¶éƒ½ä¸‰å°ç¸£ä»¤ï¼Œçš†ä¸–ä¸–ç‚ºä¾¯ï¼Œåæ°‘çš†ç›Šçˆµä¸‰ç´šï¼Œåæ°‘èƒ½ç›¸å®‰ï¼Œçš†è³œä¹‹å…­é‡‘ã€‚ã€ é¦®äº­å‚æ¶•ä¸è¦‹ä½¿è€…ï¼Œæ›°ï¼šã€Œå¾ä¸è™•ä¸‰ä¸ç¾©ä¹Ÿï¼šç‚ºä¸»å®ˆåœ°ï¼Œä¸èƒ½æ­»å›ºï¼Œä¸ç¾©ä¸€çŸ£ï¼› å…¥ä¹‹ç§¦ï¼Œä¸è½ä¸»ä»¤ï¼Œä¸ç¾©äºŒçŸ£ï¼› è³£ä¸»åœ°è€Œé£Ÿä¹‹ï¼Œä¸ç¾©ä¸‰çŸ£ã€‚ã€ è¶™é‚ç™¼å…µå–ä¸Šé»¨ã€‚ å»‰é —å°‡è»è»é•·å¹³ã€‚
Zhao Bao exited. The wang summoned Ping Yuan Jun and Zhao Yu and told them. He replied: 'Dispatching a million-man army to attack, passing years without obtaining one city. Now seated receiving seventeen cities and towns - this is great benefit. It cannot be lost.' The wang said: 'Good.' He then commanded Zhao Sheng to receive the lands and told Feng Ting: 'Humble state's envoy, minister Sheng. Humble state's lord sent Sheng to deliver orders. With ten-thousand-household cities, three to enfeoff governors. Thousand-household cities, three to enfeoff county magistrates. All to be hous generation after generation. Officials and people all increase rank three levels. Officials and people able to be mutually peaceful - all grant six gold.' Feng Ting shed tears and did not see the envoy. He said: 'I will not do three unrighteous acts. Serving as lord guarding land, I cannot die defending - this is unrighteous one.' Entering to Qin, not listening to lord's command - this is unrighteous two. Selling lord's land and eating it - this is unrighteous three.' Zhao then dispatched troops and took Shang Dang. Lian Po led the army and stationed at Chang Ping.

In the seventh month, Lian Po was dismissed and Zhao Kuo replaced him as general. The Qin people surrounded Zhao Kuo. Zhao Kuo surrendered with the army. The troops, forty-some ten thousand, were all pit-killed. The wang regretted not listening to Zhao Bao's plan. Therefore there was the Chang Ping calamity.

In the tenth year, Yan attacked Chang Zhuang and captured it in the fifth month. Zhao generals Yue Cheng and Qing She attacked Qin's Xin Liang army and broke it. The crown prince died. In the fifteenth year, they enfeoffed Chancellor Lian Po as Xin Ping Jun with Wei Wen. Yan Wang commanded Chancellor Li Fu to make a treaty. With five hundred gold he presented wine to Zhao Wang. Returning home, he reported to Yan Wang: 'Zhao clan's strong ones all died at Chang Ping. Their orphans are not yet strong. It can be attacked.' The wang summoned Chang Guo Jun Yue Xian and asked him. He replied: 'Zhao is a four-battle state. Its people are accustomed to weapons. Attacking it is not possible.' The wang said: 'I with many attacking few, two attacking one - is this possible?' He replied: 'Not possible.' The wang said: 'I then with five attacking one - possible?' He replied: 'Not possible.' Yan Wang was greatly angered. All the ministers considered it possible. Yan troops raised two armies with two thousand chariots. Li Fu led and attacked Hao. Qing Qin led and attacked Dai. Lian Po as Zhao general broke and killed Li Fu, capturing Qing Qin and Yue Xian.
106
åå…­å¹´ï¼Œå»‰é —åœç‡•ã€‚ ä»¥æ¨‚ä¹˜ç‚ºæ­¦è¥„å›ã€‚ åä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œå‡ç›¸å¤§å°‡æ­¦è¥„å›æ”»ç‡•ï¼Œåœå…¶åœ‹ã€‚ åå…«å¹´ï¼Œå»¶é™µéˆç‡å¸«å¾ç›¸åœ‹ä¿¡å¹³å›åŠ©é­æ”»ç‡•ã€‚ ç§¦æ‹”æˆ‘æ¦†æ¬¡ä¸‰åä¸ƒåŸã€‚ åä¹å¹´ï¼Œè¶™èˆ‡ç‡•æ˜“åœŸï¼šä»¥é¾å…Œã€æ±¾é–€ã€è‡¨æ¨‚èˆ‡ç‡•ï¼› ç‡•ä»¥è‘›ã€æ­¦é™½ã€å¹³èˆ’èˆ‡è¶™ã€‚
In the sixteenth year, Lian Po surrounded Yan. They made Yue Cheng Wu Xiang Jun. In the seventeenth year, acting chancellor great general Wu Xiang Jun attacked Yan and surrounded its state. In the eighteenth year, Yan Ling Gou led troops and followed Chancellor Xin Ping Jun to assist Wei in attacking Yan. Qin captured our thirty-seven cities at Yu Ci. In the nineteenth year, Zhao exchanged lands with Yan: giving Long Dui, Fen Men, and Lin Yue to Yan; Yan gave Ge, Wu Yang, and Ping Shu to Zhao.
107
äºŒåå¹´ï¼Œç§¦ç‹æ”¿åˆç«‹ã€‚ ç§¦æ‹”æˆ‘æ™‰é™½ã€‚
In the twentieth year, Qin Wang Zheng was first established. Qin captured our Jin Yang.
108
äºŒåä¸€å¹´ï¼Œå­æˆç‹å’ã€‚ å»‰é —å°‡ï¼Œæ”»ç¹é™½ï¼Œå–ä¹‹ã€‚ ä½¿æ¨‚ä¹˜ä»£ä¹‹ï¼Œå»‰é —æ”»æ¨‚ä¹˜ï¼Œæ¨‚ä¹˜èµ°ï¼Œå»‰é —äº¡å…¥é­ã€‚ å­åƒç«‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ç‚ºæ‚¼è¥„ç‹ã€‚
In the twenty-first year, Xiao Cheng Wang died. Lian Po as general attacked Fan Yang and took it. They sent Yue Cheng to replace him. Lian Po attacked Yue Cheng. Yue Cheng fled. Lian Po fled and entered Wei. Son Yan was established. This was Dao Xiang Wang.
109
æ‚¼è¥„ç‹å…ƒå¹´ï¼Œå¤§å‚™é­ã€‚ æ¬²é€šå¹³é‚‘ã€ä¸­ç‰Ÿä¹‹é“ï¼Œä¸æˆã€‚
In Dao Xiang Wang's first year, they greatly prepared against Wei. They desired to connect the road between Ping Yi and Zhong Mu, but did not succeed.
110
äºŒå¹´ï¼Œæç‰§å°‡ï¼Œæ”»ç‡•ï¼Œæ‹”æ­¦é‚ã€æ–¹åŸã€‚ ç§¦å¬æ˜¥å¹³å›ï¼Œå› è€Œç•™ä¹‹ã€‚ æ³„éˆç‚ºä¹‹è¬‚æ–‡ä¿¡ä¾¯æ›°ï¼šã€Œæ˜¥å¹³å›è€…ï¼Œè¶™ç‹ç”šæ„›ä¹‹è€Œéƒä¸­ä¹‹ï¼Œæ•…ç›¸èˆ‡è¬€æ›°ã€æ˜¥å¹³å›å…¥ç§¦ï¼Œç§¦å¿…ç•™ä¹‹ã€ï¼Œæ•…ç›¸èˆ‡è¬€è€Œå…§ä¹‹ç§¦ä¹Ÿã€‚ ä»Šå›ç•™ä¹‹ï¼Œæ˜¯çµ•è¶™è€Œéƒä¸­ä¹‹è¨ˆä¸­ä¹Ÿã€‚ å›ä¸å¦‚é£æ˜¥å¹³å›è€Œç•™å¹³éƒ½ã€‚ æ˜¥å¹³å›è€…è¨€è¡Œä¿¡æ–¼ç‹ï¼Œç‹å¿…åšå‰²è¶™è€Œè´–å¹³éƒ½ã€‚ã€ æ–‡ä¿¡ä¾¯æ›°ï¼šã€Œå–„ã€‚ã€ å› é£ä¹‹ã€‚ åŸéŸ“çš‹ã€‚
In the second year, Li Mu as general attacked Yan and captured Wu Sui and Fang Cheng. Qin summoned Chun Ping Jun and thus detained him. Xie Gou for him told Wen Xin Hou: 'Chun Ping Jun - Zhao Wang very loved him and made him a palace attendant. Therefore they mutually plotted, saying 'If Chun Ping Jun enters Qin, Qin will certainly detain him.' Therefore they mutually plotted and sent him into Qin. Now sir detaining him cuts off Zhao and the palace attendant's plan hits the mark. Sir would be better to send Chun Ping Jun and detain Ping Du. Chun Ping Jun's words and conduct are trustworthy to the wang. The wang will certainly thickly cut Zhao to redeem Ping Du.' Wen Xin Hou said: 'Good.' Thus they sent him. They walled Han Gao.
111
ä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œé¾ç…–å°‡ï¼Œæ”»ç‡•ï¼Œç¦½å…¶å°‡åŠ‡è¾›ã€‚ å››å¹´ï¼Œé¾ç…–å°‡è¶™ã€æ¥šã€é­ã€ç‡•ä¹‹éŠ³å¸«ï¼Œæ”»ç§¦è•ï¼Œä¸æ‹”ï¼› ç§»æ”»é½Šï¼Œå–é¥’å®‰ã€‚ äº”å¹´ï¼Œå‚…æŠµå°‡ï¼Œå±…å¹³é‚‘ï¼› æ…¶èˆå°‡æ±é™½æ²³å¤–å¸«ï¼Œå®ˆæ²³æ¢ã€‚ å…­å¹´ï¼Œå°é•·å®‰å›ä»¥é¥’ã€‚ é­èˆ‡è¶™é„´ã€‚
In the third year, Pang Juan as general attacked Yan and captured its general Ju Xin. In the fourth year, Pang Juan led Zhao, Chu, Wei, and Yan's sharp troops to attack Qin's Cui, but did not capture it; They shifted and attacked Qi, taking Rao An. In the fifth year, Fu Di as general resided in Ping Yi; Qing She as general led the troops outside Dong Yang He and guarded He Liang. In the sixth year, they enfeoffed Chang An Jun with Rao. Wei allied with Zhao at Ye.
112
ä¹å¹´ï¼Œè¶™æ”»ç‡•ï¼Œå–è²ã€é™½åŸã€‚ å…µæœªç½·ï¼Œç§¦æ”»é„´ï¼Œæ‹”ä¹‹ã€‚ æ‚¼è¥„ç‹å’ï¼Œå­å¹½ç¹†ç‹é·ç«‹ã€‚
In the ninth year, Zhao attacked Yan and took Li and Yang Cheng. The troops were not disbanded when Qin attacked Ye and captured it. Dao Xiang Wang died. His son You Mu Wang Qian was established.
113
å¹½ç¹†ç‹é·å…ƒå¹´ï¼ŒåŸæŸäººã€‚ äºŒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ”»æ­¦åŸï¼Œæ‰ˆè¼’ç‡å¸«æ•‘ä¹‹ï¼Œè»æ•—ï¼Œæ­»ç„‰ã€‚
In You Mu Wang Qian's first year, they walled Bo Ren. In the second year, Qin attacked Wu Cheng. Hu Zhe led troops to save it. The army was defeated and he died there.
114
ä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ”»èµ¤éº—ã€å®œå®‰ï¼Œæç‰§ç‡å¸«èˆ‡æˆ°è‚¥ä¸‹ï¼Œå»ä¹‹ã€‚ å°ç‰§ç‚ºæ­¦å®‰å›ã€‚ å››å¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ”»ç•ªå¾ï¼Œæç‰§èˆ‡ä¹‹æˆ°ï¼Œå»ä¹‹ã€‚
In the third year, Qin attacked Chi Li and Yi An. Li Mu led troops and fought them below Fei, repelling them. They enfeoffed Mu as Wu An Jun. In the fourth year, Qin attacked Fan Wu. Li Mu fought them and repelled them.
115
äº”å¹´ï¼Œä»£åœ°å¤§å‹•ï¼Œè‡ªæ¨‚å¾ä»¥è¥¿ï¼ŒåŒ—è‡³å¹³é™°ï¼Œè‡ºå±‹å¢»å£å¤ªåŠå£ï¼Œåœ°å¼æ±è¥¿ç™¾ä¸‰åæ­¥ã€‚ å…­å¹´ï¼Œå¤§é¥‘ï¼Œæ°‘è¨›è¨€æ›°ï¼šã€Œè¶™ç‚ºè™Ÿï¼Œç§¦ç‚ºç¬‘ã€‚ ä»¥ç‚ºä¸ä¿¡ï¼Œè¦–åœ°ä¹‹ç”Ÿæ¯›ã€‚ã€
In the fifth year, Dai lands greatly moved. From Yue Xu west, north to Ping Yin, towers and houses and walls - too half were ruined. The ground cracked east to west one hundred thirty paces. In the sixth year, great famine. The people spread false rumors saying: 'Zhao for cry, Qin for laugh. They considered it unbelievable and said to look at the ground producing hair.'
116
ä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦äººæ”»è¶™ï¼Œè¶™å¤§å°‡æç‰§ã€å°‡è»å¸é¦¬å°šå°‡ï¼Œæ“Šä¹‹ã€‚ æç‰§èª…ï¼Œå¸é¦¬å°šå…ï¼Œè¶™æ€±åŠé½Šå°‡é¡èšä»£ä¹‹ã€‚ è¶™æ€±è»ç ´ï¼Œé¡èšäº¡å»ã€‚ ä»¥ç‹é·é™ã€‚
In the seventh year, Qin people attacked Zhao. Zhao great general Li Mu and general Si Ma Shang led and attacked them. Li Mu was executed. Si Ma Shang was dismissed. Zhao Cong and Qi general Yan Ju replaced them. Zhao Cong's army was broken. Yan Ju fled away. They surrendered with Wang Qian.
117
å…«å¹´åæœˆï¼Œé‚¯é„²ç‚ºç§¦ã€‚
In the eighth year, tenth month, Han Dan became Qin.
118
å¤ªå²å…¬æ›°ã€‚ å¾èé¦®ç‹å­«æ›°ï¼šã€Œè¶™ç‹é·ï¼Œå…¶æ¯å€¡ä¹Ÿï¼Œå¬–æ–¼æ‚¼è¥„ç‹ã€‚ æ‚¼è¥„ç‹å»¢é©å­å˜‰è€Œç«‹é·ã€‚ é·ç´ ç„¡è¡Œï¼Œä¿¡è®’ï¼Œæ•…èª…å…¶è‰¯å°‡æç‰§ï¼Œç”¨éƒ­é–‹ã€‚ã€ è±ˆä¸ç¹†å“‰ï¼ ç§¦æ—¢è™œé·ï¼Œè¶™ä¹‹äº¡å¤§å¤«å…±ç«‹å˜‰ç‚ºç‹ï¼Œç‹ä»£å…­æ­²ï¼Œç§¦é€²å…µç ´å˜‰ï¼Œé‚æ»…è¶™ä»¥ç‚ºéƒ¡ã€‚
The Grand Historian said. I heard Feng Wang Sun say: 'Zhao Wang Qian - his mother was an entertainer, favored by Dao Xiang Wang. Dao Xiang Wang deposed legitimate son Jia and established Qian. Qian originally had no conduct. He believed slander. Therefore he executed his good general Li Mu and used Guo Kai.' How not confused! Qin already captured Qian. Zhao's fled grand masters together established Jia as wang. He reigned in Dai for six years. Qin advanced troops and broke Jia, then extinguished Zhao and made it a commandery.
